thread.title: Is Zoe Ball dating again? Star's dad says she is 'very happy'
thread.title_full: Is Zoe Ball dating again? Star's dad says she is 'very happy'

title: Is Zoe Ball dating again? Star's dad says she is 'very happy'
text:
Is Zoe Ball dating again? Star's dad says she is 'very happy' February 05, 2017 Leave a comment 
It looks like Zoe Ball has a new man in her life! The star is reportedly dating Antiques Roadshow cameraman Billy Yates , 40, and her dad Johnny Ball revealed that the 46-year-old is "very happy". He told The Sun : "We are very happy that she is finding a new lease of life. She is very happy at the moment, she really is, and that is lovely." The pair have been spotted out and about in London, and one onlooker told the Mirror : "They looked like a new couple who are besotted with each other. Zoe couldn't stop smiling and was very into him, they look great together."
